tooltip: Select Vakat the Winged as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Vakat focuses on improving the damage of her forces.
Allows you to summon Vakat, a flying hero that attacks with his diving sword.
Flying Mage unit that hurls fireballs at its targets.
Peons are replaced by flying Aerolfos Peons.
Treehoppers, Dinolfos Butcher, Chameleofos Striker, and Dinolfos Footman gain axes on their tails, doubling their Hack damage.
